string.text: This is the encyclopaedia. As you progress in the game, information about the world around you will be added here, sorted by topic.
About the encyclopaedia
Factory bandit's PDA
Trader: get inside the army outpost and steal the case containing the report of the military expedition to the northern part of the Zone.
Dead rookie's PDA

Fanatic: Help us defend against the Mercs who ordered the rookies to clear off the camp. The plan goes like that. Everyone hides, so the camp looks deserted, we let the Mercs inside the camp, then attack on captain's order.
Guide's PDA
Meeting Doctor
So that's how it is... It turns out the task was in my PDA... I don't understanding anything. Killing yourself. I need to find this Journalist...
OK, I'll meet with Ghost's man. I will be waiting for him in Strelok's hiding place. If he's one of our own, he will know where to look for me. Doctor.

Trader: "...my guys were coming back from an assignment and disappeared. One of them - called Nimble - was bringing me some info...And they all disappeared really close by because they missed the bridge. Don't know what to think. Anyway: find Nimble, dead or alive, just as long as he has the flash drive. Bring it to me. Nimble was one of Wolf's men - and Wolf is here in the camp. Ask him, he probably knows something. He'll help you with weapons and gear."
Seriy to Fox: a friend wants me to give a helping hand to a bunch of stalkers that dug out Strelok's stash. I'm off to the hangar at the Garbage with my boys. That's where you can find me.
Yesterday one brother went to scout the deserted mill and we haven't heard from him since. We need to go there and see where he disappeared to.

Wolf: bring the dynamite stolen by the bandits at the factory. To help you, there are scouts under the bridge, come to them and say "Hello from the underworld" - that's the password. Lead them into battle.
Wolf: clear the bandits at the factory with the help of my scouts behind the bridge, then return and report.
Dead stalker's PDA
...came to in the den of an unknown one-handed man, can't remember anything. Just have a PDA on me with a picture of some other dude. There's just one message in the PDA - kill Strelok.
Fox: I've got a pack of dogs on my tail. Help me get rid of them.
Trader: Fox has come back from his raid and is asking for help. He's carrying important info. Doesn't want to attract attention to himself in the camp. Perhaps he knows something about Strelok.
Fox: Seriy is sitting in the hangar at the Garbage, he knows more about Strelok.
Trader: steal the expedition report from the military at the MedPribor Research Institute, take it to the 100 Rads bar and give it to the Barkeep.
Fox's PDA

Tolik's diary:
Trader sent us to get an artifact in the Dark Valley. He says it's valuable. So we agreed to it... Got there and shot everybody we could. We found the artifact where the trader told us it'd be. Then we went back... On the way back, my partner suddenly had some kind of seizure. Twisted around like crazy... Had to wait it out for a few hours.
We arrived in the Cordon in the morning. We walked around the vehicle station, since there's nothing to do there right now... We almost made it to the village - and then shit hit the fan. We ran into the military. God damn it! They demanded all the stuff we found, including the Compass... Rare artifact, probably one of a kind... No idea what happened to it, it's probably already been sold in the Great Land. Ugh... We're walking the road - we can already see the village...
Really bad day, really bad...
Seriy to Fox: one guy I know asked to meet a group of stalkers who sniffed out Strelok's hiding place. I'll be at the Garbage, come over if you want.
Tolik's PDA
Trader: there is a Whirligig anomaly field close by. There is an artifact in its center. Get it.
There's a very strange anomaly here. It looks like it's moving. I'll try to calculate its movement times and path, because I don't have the cash to pay the soldiers for passage.
I left a small cache at the deserted farm. It's got some food and ammo. I'm way too weak to carry it now. I'm not sure if I can make it to the camp.
Trader: Head to the train car by the road! There are wounded men there. Help the survivors.

Wolf: "My final wish in this place is to leave a gift for one of my friends. My guys were on their way here, bringing him along, but the bandits had their way with them. So we have to return them the favor. The bandits have settled down in the factory. As for their giftЕ Nothing special. Just a pack of dynamitesЕ".
Bring a stash with tools to the technician in the Cordon.
Report from L. Plyusch

This is how things went... We went around the perimiter, not far from the outpost. Saw a couple of stalkers who were hanging around the train car by the road. We decided to shake 'em up, fill out an "accident report," things in the Zone and all that. So, naturally, предложили другой выход из ситуации... Basically, they had a circle-shaped artifact that they seem to call the "Compass"... Put simply, after we "bargained" with them, a helicopter flew by us, seemingly a military bird, but definitely not one of ours. And, basically, it finished off those stalkers by the train car. Probably. Though I did hear gunshots a couple of times, seemingly from a PM... So, we didn't hang around there and just ran. But we didn't bring the artifact to the outpost. We hid it in a stash... Took a long time to carry it, but it was worth it. Basically, the "anomalous formation" will be hidden north of the vehicle station, around the blocked-up railway tunnel, in the rocks. Think I hid it well...\nBasically, this ain't a good report at all - I wrote a lot of "personal" stuff. But you should read it when you get the time. And don't give the computer password to anybody.\nL. Plyusch.
